title: Lofi Chill Hop Selection Vol_1
description: This pack is perfect for projects that requires chill vibes, lo-fi vibes and seamless loop music.
longDescription:
This pack is perfect for project that requires chill vibes, lo-fi vibes and seamless loop music.

10 tracks included and 15 addictional lenghts and loops

Link preview https://youtu.be/lv3_bsFgB18

Audio details

10 full-length tracks and 15 other different lengths version/loops

About the author

Ermanno Capirone is an italian producer, composer and musician. He can quote the inclusion of his songs in the Netflix series "Running for the Truth_The Alex Schwazer case", the Rai Play series "Le città del futuro" and in the movie "Genoa, comunque e ovunque".

Link: linktr.ee/ermannocapirone

His dedication to composition leads him to develop his own musical project under the pseudonym Bob Rocket. In his latest release "Encelado" the astrophysicist and popularizer Amedeo Balbi talks about space, accompanied by the electronic music of Bob Rocket.

Link: linktr.ee/bobrocket

He works daily as an independent producer in the field of audiovisual music both with synchronization licenses and in the royalty free music scene.
